pages.text: First you need to make a stone axe to get some wood. Sure, you can punch the trees with your fists, but that would not be very civilized now would it? $(br) You can find sticks and rocks lying around on the ground. Sticks can also be made from twigs, which you get by furiously attacking tree leaves.
After getting the hatchet, you can get wood more easily. Then you can start thinking about making a pick for mining stone from the ground.
